name: GreatApps.com
overview:
GreatApps.com is a media company that focuses on app marketing and consumer use of apps.

The GreatApps.com platform showcases apps to people who may have never thought to search for them.

Great Apps serves two markets:

1.App Users - to make it easy for consumers to learn about new apps.

2.App Developers/Owners - to help developers and businesses market their apps in a cost effective manner to reach users.

For consumers looking for apps: GreatApps.com displays apps that developers and business owners truly believe in. To provide the best user experience and to preserve individuality, GreatApps.com only allows up to 25 new apps to be displayed daily. In addition to their searchable database, users have the option to receive customized email alerts of your favorite type of app or specific interest.

For app developers and business owners: You have made your app and its great. Now its time get more downloads and users. GreatApps.com offers a platform to showcase your app(s) to people who may never have thought to search for it. Getting people to learn about your app can be an uphill battle; however, their unique marketing approach gives you the tools to get noticed. They have a national marketing reach that goes well beyond what an individual could typically achieve on their own. They have the most marketable URL’s in GreatApps.com and GreatApp.com. Their intuitive interface is designed to be simple to use and appeals to a broad audience of users. GreatApps.com only allows up to 25 new apps daily.

Additional properties:

Great Apps For Kids (http://www.GreatAppsForKids.com)

Great App Games (http://www.GreatAppGames.com)

Great Book Apps (http://www.GreatBookApps.com)

Top App Videos (http://www.TopAppVideos.com)
